mapper.select: SELECT i_devel, ctn1, ctn2, ctn3, ctn4, ctn5, ctnChk1, ctnChk2, ctnChk3, ctnChk4, ctnChk5, date_format(r_dt, '%Y-%c-%d') AS r_dt FROM t_devel ORDER BY r_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_devel (ctn1, ctn2, ctn3, ctn4, ctn5) VALUES (#{ctn1}, #{ctn2}, #{ctn3}, #{ctn4}, #{ctn5})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_devel SET ctnChk1 = #{ctnChk1}, ctnChk2 = #{ctnChk2}, ctnChk3 = #{ctnChk3}, ctnChk4 = #{ctnChk4}, ctnChk5 = #{ctnChk5} WHERE i_devel = #{i_devel}
